description:
1. Boot an instance using existing image
2. Upload a new version of image to the glance (glance image-update --file)
3. Boot another instance using updated image 

Expected result
Should re-upload the image to cache 

Actual result
Does not re-upload the image
title: VMWARE: Boot action should re-upload image to datastore if contents of the image are changed in glance
